mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_attachment( id, achievement_id, attachment_name, attachment_source, comments, attachment_path )VALUES( #{id}, #{achievement.achievementId}, #{attachmentName}, #{attachmentSource}, #{comments}, #{attachmentPath} )
